review_details: Just go - it’s perfect. Lovely garden setting, beautiful flower gazebo. Food and service excellent. Slight breeze in the trees and above the beach so fab view.

A relaxing day with great people and a real taste of Greece. Fishing on the boat, releasing the fish from the nets and then our captain cooked the catch for us whilst we lay on a secluded beach! Turtles and a bit of snorkelling too. The food was amazing, fresh & tasty. Nothing too much trouble. You have to try this, more personal, very traditional and we learnt something too. Thank you Maria and Captain - we loved it!

Visited for an early evening meal with husband. Loved the decor and tried lots of different dishes followed by a dramatic “Garden for her”. Great fun and would defo recommend. Harry our server was friendly and not intrusive. We also didn’t feel rushed as we have in other restaurants early doors. A very enjoyable evening.
